description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

notes: 資源所與職資源所合開

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

name.zh: 時間序列分析與製程控制
name.en: Time Series Analysis and Process Adjustment

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於教導學生如何利用時間序列分析、品質製程管制、工程製程控制等方法來達成先進製程控制的目的。課程講述之內容包含下列課題:製程監控、製程調整、離散動態製程、時間序列模型、轉換方程模型、最佳回饋控制器、指數加權移動平均控制、遞迴式估計與自適應控制等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students a modern treatment of discrete-time advanced process control (APC) methods based on time series analysis, statistical process control (SPC) and engineering process control (EPC) for Quality Engineering in manufacturing. The topics that will be addressed in this course include:(1)	Process Monitoring; (2)	Process Adjustment;(3)	Discrete-Time Dynamical Processes; (4)	ARIMA Time Series Models; (5)	Transfer Function Modeling; (6)	Optimal Feedback Controllers; (7)	EWMA Control; (8)	Recursive Estimation and Adaptive Control.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉中西方翻譯理論的重要概念與原則，並將理論知識運用於各種文體的英漢與漢英實務翻譯上。學生將對翻譯理論深入探討，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of translation theories, both Chinese and Western. It will also assist students in applying their theoretical knowledge to practical English <-> Chinese translations of various types. Its aim is to help students to discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討多輸入多輸出系統(MIMO)其系統行為之描述，內容包括MIMO系統之穩定性分析、觀察性分析及其控制器設計，並探討MIMO系統的物理觀念及其數學描述的各種方法，是線性系統之進階課程，適合碩士班以上之學生學習。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to explore the behaviors of multivariable systems. The contents includes: stability analysis, observability analysis, and controller designs for MIMO linear systems. Besides, we will introduce the physical concept of MMIO linear systems and various methods of describing MIMO linear systems via mathematical model. This is an advanced course to linear system theory, and is especially for graduate students.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。
description.en: main -machine Interface (MMI)1.Introduction to automation 2.Perosn computer Interface 3.Platform of main machine interface :Windows operation system. 4.Windows Application program Interface :DLL,DDE and active X program design.5. Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

name.en: Intellectual Property Management for Global Brands

description.zh: 於高科技、知識經濟時代，作為無形資產之「全球品牌」，已成為促進公司價值及成長之引擎。此全球品牌大時代氛圍，「全球品牌」策略愈發重要。品牌策略管理在提供客戶認知、產品績效及企業價值。藉由品牌溝通，品牌創造客戶對品牌之熟悉及偏好，而達成商業管理目標，進而提昇股東價值及股價市值。本課程將就下列議題及知名品牌運作模式為說明：一、品牌發展策略，二、品牌價值，三、品牌商標保護策略(即1. 商標計畫，2. 商標執行，3. 商標控制）。四、公司治理與品牌管理。五、智財品牌授權。
description.en: In High-tech knowledge economy, as intangible assets "global brand", has become an engine for raising company value. During this global brand era, "global brand" strategy is important for enhancing customer awareness and business performance.  Through diversified brand communication, global brand creates customer familiarity and preference, and to achieve business goals, thereby enhancing shareholder value.The course focuses on the following topics: First, the brand development strategy, Second, brand value, Third, brand & trademark protection strategy. Fourth, corporate governance and brand management. .Fifth, intellectual property/brand licensing.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

notes: 智財所與職智財所合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

name.zh: 液氣壓混合動力車特論
name.en: Special Topics on Hydraulic and Pneumatic Hybrid Vehicle

description.zh: 傳統車輛卻往往因為間歇式行駛模式，最容易產生大量廢氣及油耗汙染。雖然純電動車具有高 效能與及低汙染的特性，但行駛距離的受限與電池價格昂貴。而油電混合車雖然可以達到環保節能的目的，但跟傳統車輛來比仍昂貴許多。液壓混合動力車仍以引擎作動，需要加速時與其他動力源交替使用，等液壓系統蓄能器用盡再回到傳統引擎運作，與泵浦馬達配合利用剎車產生的動力回收，此循環模式回收再利用，以達到節省耗油及降低污染功用，特論將討論其相關技術與理論。
description.en: The traditional vehicle is often in intermittent mode, most likely to produce a lot of pollution emissions and fuel consumption. Though an electric vehicle with high efficiency and low pollution characteristics, yet the range is limited and batteries are expensive. Hybrid cars can achieve the objective of environmental protection and energy saving, but they are still expensive compared to conventional vehicles. Hydraulic hybrid vehicles use engines and hydraulic motor/pump as alternate power source. The energy storage elements are high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators thanks.  With the aid of hydraulic motor/pump and high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators’ thanks, the brake-generated power recovery is achieved and reused in turn for acceleration. This special topic focus on the related technologies and theories.

notes: 車輛所與職車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹互動媒體設計與製作時所需要的資訊技術與應用程式。本課程的內容包含了解目前發展互動科技應用時可使用之應用程式與系統的概念、元件及操作原理的介紹。並透過基礎元件設計的應用與實作，培養學生透過應用程式與腳本語言程式的撰寫。有別於資訊相關科系程式設計的課程，本課程將發展包含程式應用概念介紹、程式撰寫邏輯思維訓練、以及互動程式撰寫的模組，學生可依自己的興趣以及投未來生涯規劃需求，選擇不頭的學習模組，以培養未來互動科技發展所需的跨領域專業知識。另本課程也結合業界的資源與師資，協助學生深入了解未來互動科技技術與程式應用的發展趨勢。
description.en: This course provides an introduction to the principles of information technologies and programming coding skills that can be used in interaction design element of the multimedia production process. Course activities are focused on programming coding skills training and the descriptions, contents, principles and applications of the changes to the digital technologies of interaction design and their future trends. This course encourages students to critically engage with interdisciplinary approaches to information technologies and interaction design in a context of peer support and feedback, in order to forge their own unique personal skills. These skills are then applied to a real-world design project in which students work with a project, with advice and input from industry professionals.

notes: 限本系生&上限人數18人修課

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹台灣專利實務為主，包括專利分類與檢索、專利要件、說明書與申請專利範圍之解讀與撰寫、審查意見通知與核駁審定、專利舉發、專利侵害鑑定、專利訴訟；也簡要介紹美國與中國大陸專利實務。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Taiwan-based patent practice, including:1.	patent classification and search2.	industrial application, usability, novelty, inventive step, unobviousness3.	description and claims 4.	office action and rejection5.	cancellation6.	patent infringement7.	patent litigation8.	U.S. patent practice9.	Chinese patent practice

name.zh: 國際貿易與智財專題研究

description.zh: 智慧財產是國際貿易中的重要一環，近20年來，由於知識經濟的發展與國際多邊條約的興起，國際架構下的智財法制愈形重要。各國無不苦思如何在保護主義與自由貿易之間取得平衡，此時研究國際貿易角力下的智財發展，具有相當意義。本課程即在提供學生對重要國際組織與條約下所形成的智財法制的基本了解，並由實務案例的討論中，帶領同學分析國際智財法制對國家經濟、法規面的影響。
description.en: Intellectual Property has played an important role as an integral part of the international trade, and its significance has been increasing over the past two decades contributed by the burgeoning international treaties and knowledge-driven economic models.  While individual nations struggle to achieve national prosperity by striking a balance between protectionism and free trade, the changes in intellectual property law and policy under the tussle of international trade are worth of our close attention.  This course intends to provide students with a general understanding on both the theories and practice of intellectual property legal regimes within the context of international trade. Students will learn how the frameworks of intellectual property law and policy affect the societies and economies of individual member states of international treaties. By drawing selected cases for discussion, students will further be equipped with abilities to analyze the impact of international treati

notes: 與日間部智財所合開，限10人

description.zh: 本課程主要關注台灣專利申請的程序觀點。其相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、發明人訪談、審查意見答覆寫作、訴願狀寫作和專利申請策略。此外，國際專利申請的實務觀點也會在課堂上討論以做為比較。本課程教材包括專利申請教科書、各國專利申請基準、和法院判決等。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspect of the patent prosecution in Taiwan. The topics cover inventorship, ownership (including a right to file a patent application), priority, formality, inventor interview, office action response drafting, petition brief drafting, and patent filing strategy.  In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented for comparison. The class materials include a patent prosecution textbook, patent examination guidelines from different counties, and court decisions.

notes: 與日間部智財所合開，限10人

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

description.zh: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業(Best Management Practice, BMP)之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。
description.en: Nonpoint source (NPS) pollution of streams, lakes, and estuaries has been a critical concern throughout the world.  The difficulty in both identifying and assessing nonpoint source pollution resides precisely in the complex nature of NPS.  This course aims to expose students to state-of-the-art tools and techniques for developing effective Best Management Practice (BMP) allocation plans to control NPS pollution at the watershed scale.  The foundations of this course will be focused on definition of NPS pollution, NPS pollutant dynamics in bioenvironmental systems, watershed hydrology and NPS pollutant transport, as well as BMPs for NPS pollution control.  Students will next learn how to apply Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), hydrologic modeling and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to the solutions of NPS pollution problems in watersheds.  The tools and techniques presented are flexible and students will be able to apply them to solve NPS type of proble

description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

description.zh: 岩石工程是一門應用的課程，它的重點在於把基本的岩石力學的原理，運用在實際的工程問題上，因此，這門課將介紹岩石力學在岩石邊坡、岩石基礎、及岩石隧道上的應用。上課的學生在完成這門課之後，應該對這三大類的問題都有清楚的了解。為了使沒有上過岩石力學的學生也能進入狀況，這門課會先對岩體分類法（如RMR法及Q法）及立體投影圖加以回顧，然後再進行岩石邊坡工程、岩石基礎工程、及岩石隧道工程的介紹。「岩石工程」的課程大綱如下：
description.en: The focus of this course is the application of the basic principles of rock mechanics.  Three types of applications are to be covered in this semester-long course: rock slopes, rock foundations, and rock tunnels.  The students are expected to complete assignments in each of the above three categories.  To prepare students with no previous academic work in rock mechanics, this course will review the classification systems of rock masses (such as the RMR and the Q systems).  Also, the stereographic projection is a required tool, which will be introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程將探討明渠中穩定流、非穩定流、均勻流、非均勻流之流體特性。
description.en: Open channel hydraulics treats the motion of water in conduits that have a free surface, that is, in which the flow of water is not completely bounded by the channel perimeter and one surface is exposed to atmospheric pressure.  The flows can be steady (time-invariant) or unsteady, uniform (space-invariant) or non-uniform (gradually, rapidly, or spatially varied).  For engineers, open channels are very common for the conveyance of natural waters, storm discharges, sewage collection systems, and aqueducts for water distribution systems. Knowledge of the mechanics of open-channel flow, then, is important for the proper design of these facilities.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 應用定量分析法於水資源規劃與管理，並介紹系統分析、本益比之評估、多目標規劃與風險評估。
description.en: Quantitative analytical methods in water resources planning and management; introduction to systems analysis, benefit/cost, multi-objective planning and risk assessment.

description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 本課程係以營建工程管理之架構為主要核心，進階探討工程執行生命週期中之重點管理工作，並透過相關案例之研討，探討工程實務運作上之問題及管理對策。課程內容主要包含營建工程專案管理概念，營建管理方法，工程執行方式與管理策略，工程契約管理，工程爭議處理，工程界面管理等內容。
description.en: 英課名：Construct manage special discuss      1.Manage summary and make tactics.      2.Investigation manage key element analyze.      3.Engineering economy and financial affairs manage.      4.Construction procreation might analyze.      5.Construction risk manage.      6.Value engineering.      7.Engineering contract analyze.      8.Engineering disputes handle.      9.Construct automation and industrialization.     10.BOT and new way of purchasing mode.     11.Construct electron business affairs and construct         information manage.     12.Electric network technology.     13.Engineering resource manage.     14.Engineering insurance and guarantee.     15.Construct affairs administration.     16.Engineering plan proposal and analyze.     17.Communicate and crisis handle.     18.Safety sanitation, environmental protection and         neighbor loss mange.     19.Engineering laws and regulations.     20.Construct investigation manage.

description.zh: 本課程主要結合環境工程與大地工程的觀點來介紹與有關環境保護的相關問題，主要的課題包括：固體廢棄物處理、封包及改善技術，並著重於固體廢棄物掩埋法之評估、覆蓋及阻絕技術所面臨之大地工程問題及後續受污染場址之處理及再利用等。此外學生以分組的方式並針對場址調查、設計與建造、土壤與地下水污染等問題進行討論，藉此培養學生充份了解此一專業課題所引發之大地工程問題，並介紹相關之處理技術，諸如：分析模式、地工合成材及土壤材料之應用、改善及處理成效、地表及滲出水之相關問題、液體及氣體之傳輸與回收、最終覆蓋及絕層之邊坡靜動態穩定及沉陷。同時訓練學生俱備將來畢業後在此一專業領域繼續發展的能力。
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	Geotechnical Engineering related to environmental issues. Topics include: solid waste disposal, waste containment, and remediation technologies. This course provides an understanding of the use of geotechnical concepts in the analysis and design of environmental systems. Focus is placed on the evaluation of waste containment facilities, covers relevant aspects of geotechnical and remediation technologies of contaminated sites. Besides, graduates may work as part of a team investigating, designing and constructing solutions to waste containment and soil and groundwater pollution problems. This subject prepares students for this work by developing an understanding of the engineering concepts and processes and also by introducing students to specialist techniques, such as contaminant transport modelling, geosynthetics and soil materials use in waste containment, remedial issues of solidification and stabilization, landfill and surface impoundment related des

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 1.簡介  2.隨機向量之性質  3.假設測試  4.參數分類  5.參數估計 6.非參數密度估計  7.非參數分類和錯誤估計  8.連續參數估計9.特徵抽取線性對應信號表示  10. 特徵抽取線性對應分類11.分群法  12.應用

Parametric Classifiers  5.Parameter estimation  6.Nonparametric density estimation  7.Nonparametric Classification and error estimation  8.Successive parameter estimation  9.Feature extraction and linear mapping for signal representation  10.Feature extraction and linear mapping for classification 11.Clustering  12.Applications

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.en: The Architecture and the Urban Microclimate

description.zh: 納入「都市微氣候」的考量，是現階段精進建築設計與提升建築效能的關鍵手段之一；回饋在生活舒適度的感受、居住安全度的維護以及省能節電度的落實等面相，都可得到具體且顯著的成效。掌握都市微氣候的特徵型態與變化脈動，擬判對建築安排可能肇致的影響及干擾，透過自然循環的流場機制及量場管制，找到本土建築規劃之最佳改善設計策略。
description.en: Bringing the “Urban Microclimate” into consideration is one of the key methods to enhance architectural design and upgrade building effectiveness at the present time; it can get feedbacks in many aspects such as feelings of cozy life, maintenance of residential safety , and to carry out the energy-saving.  Holding the features and changes of the Urban Microclimate, analyzing the potential affect and disturb for architecture, through the control mechanism of natural circulation in order to find the best strategy for local design enhancement.

name.en: The applications of TRIZ creative method

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"系統化創新"是企業不可或缺的競爭策略及唯一的生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地應用。本課程以TRIZ創新方法為基礎，詳細的介紹系統性創新理論及實務的解題手法及落實創新方法之實務應用，可以很有系統地帶領學生們拓展革新思維，有效及系統化之應用於各種產業。讓學生也有機會應用於生活問題的解決。
description.en: Nowadays, enterprises in the phase of violating competence and decreasing profit. To make it survival, enterprises need to implement a systematic innovation technique, but only few companies really understanding and implement. The aim of this course is based on the applications of TRIZ creative method in detail which including the theory of systematic innovation and application, and also leading students to learn how the TRIZ works, and practice to solve their real life and various industries problems.

notes: 限大四和研究所(四工四甲乙、工管所與最後一哩合開)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

notes: 四工三甲、四甲、工管所合開

description.zh: 於品質要求提升之情況下，自動化檢測系統成為現行產業界重要開發之工具之一，故本課程之目的在教授開法PC-based自動化檢測系統之基本知識與技能，主要在培養未來自動化檢測之開發技術人員。課程內容包括：3D CAD 繪圖設計、BCB程式介面之開發與設計、PC-based自動化控制、光學檢測之技術、e-Vision之使用、OpenCV之程式設計、基礎資料庫之應用、品質管制圖之原理及使用、及其他檢測相關技術等。
description.en: Quality has been one of the most important issues in currently manufacturing industry such that automated inspection system becomes a crucial tool.  Therefore, the objective of this course is to offer the basic knowledge and skill in developing a PC-based automated inspection system.  The content of this course includes: 3D CAD design, programming design using Borland C++ Builder, PC-based motion and I/O control, inspection design with e-Vision, basic programming design using OpenCV, database design, quality control chart, and related knowledge about inspection tools.

notes: 四工三甲乙與工管所合開(科研640室)

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的迅速發展，網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷通路以外的一個新興通路。再加上網路全年無休、成本低廉、以全球為市場的優勢，以及可符合消費者的需求的特色，使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流，因此國外廠商紛紛上網卡位，網路商業化已成為一股不可抵擋的趨勢。本課程中將介紹對電子商務作理論與實務上的探討。1. 電子商務與商業模式2. 電子商務策略發展3. B to C電子商務4. C to C電子商務5. B to B電子商務6. 無線網路7. 企業電子化8. 企業資源規劃9. 供應鏈管理10. 顧客關係管理11知識管理與e-Learning12. 網路行銷14. 網路廣告與關鍵字廣告15. 網路安全性
description.en: E-business (electronic business) is the conducting of business on the Internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners.The outline of electronic business is as following:1. Introduction to Electronic Commerce.2. Technology Infrastructure: The Internet and the World Wide Web.3. Selling on the Web: Revenue Models and Building a Web Presence.4. Marketing on the Web.5. Business-to-Business Online Strategies6. Online Auctions, Virtual Communities, and Web Portals.7. The Environment of Electronic Commerce: Legal, Ethical, and Tax Issues.8. Web Server Hardware and Software.9: Electronic Commerce Software.10. Electronic Commerce Security.11. Payment Systems for Electronic Commerce.12. Planning for Electronic Commerce

notes: 須先修過網路行銷實務,計網電腦教室

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 技職教育倫理專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on the Ethics of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 教學內容包含：學術倫理、教師專業倫理、學校行政倫理、校務研究倫理、評鑑倫理、資訊倫理與科技倫理、及其他新興倫理議題。課程實施方法以講解、專題演講、專題討論及情境問題解決為主。研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育領域倫理相關重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題提出簡報，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，並提出心得報告於課堂中研討，或撰寫探究議題之相關學術論述，以發展研究能力。
description.en: The contents of this course include: academic ethics, professional ethics for teachers , administrative ethics, institutional research ethics, evaluation ethics, information ethics and ethics in technology as well as other emerging issues on ethics.Lecturing, keynote speeches, seminars, and situation problem solutions are the means to be conducted in class. Students can report on sub-issues  in current ethics-related fields in technological and vocational education, investigating and implementing small-scale study, reviewing and proposing related topics, or writing academic papers, for the purpose to develop strong research skills and abilities.

name.zh: 技職教育政策理論與方法
name.en: Theoretical and Methodological Study on Policy of  VTE

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討技職教育政策之理論及方法，並期培養學生運用相關理論剖析技職教育議題。
description.en: The course focuses on discussing the theory and methodology of policy in vocational and technological education (VTE). Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

name.zh: 技職教育倫理專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on the Ethics of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 教學內容包含：學術倫理、教師專業倫理、學校行政倫理、校務研究倫理、評鑑倫理、資訊倫理與科技倫理、及其他新興倫理議題。課程實施方法以講解、專題演講、專題討論及情境問題解決為主。研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育領域倫理相關重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題提出簡報，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，並提出心得報告於課堂中研討，或撰寫探究議題之相關學術論述，以發展研究能力。
description.en: The contents of this course include: academic ethics, professional ethics for teachers , administrative ethics, institutional research ethics, evaluation ethics, information ethics and ethics in technology as well as other emerging issues on ethics.Lecturing, keynote speeches, seminars, and situation problem solutions are the means to be conducted in class. Students can report on sub-issues  in current ethics-related fields in technological and vocational education, investigating and implementing small-scale study, reviewing and proposing related topics, or writing academic papers, for the purpose to develop strong research skills and abilities.

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

name.zh: 液氣壓混合動力車特論
name.en: Special Topics on Hydraulic and Pneumatic Hybrid Vehicle

description.zh: 傳統車輛卻往往因為間歇式行駛模式，最容易產生大量廢氣及油耗汙染。雖然純電動車具有高 效能與及低汙染的特性，但行駛距離的受限與電池價格昂貴。而油電混合車雖然可以達到環保節能的目的，但跟傳統車輛來比仍昂貴許多。液壓混合動力車仍以引擎作動，需要加速時與其他動力源交替使用，等液壓系統蓄能器用盡再回到傳統引擎運作，與泵浦馬達配合利用剎車產生的動力回收，此循環模式回收再利用，以達到節省耗油及降低污染功用，特論將討論其相關技術與理論。
description.en: The traditional vehicle is often in intermittent mode, most likely to produce a lot of pollution emissions and fuel consumption. Though an electric vehicle with high efficiency and low pollution characteristics, yet the range is limited and batteries are expensive. Hybrid cars can achieve the objective of environmental protection and energy saving, but they are still expensive compared to conventional vehicles. Hydraulic hybrid vehicles use engines and hydraulic motor/pump as alternate power source. The energy storage elements are high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators thanks.  With the aid of hydraulic motor/pump and high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators’ thanks, the brake-generated power recovery is achieved and reused in turn for acceleration. This special topic focus on the related technologies and theories.

description.zh: 讓學生了解投資的基本觀念，課程內容主管要介紹證券(股票、債券)、期貨、選擇權的投資，以及證券的評價模式和CAPM等訂價模式說明。
description.en: The course helps stdents to understand the knowledge of investment. It includes security. Future option and CAPM Models.

notes: 經管所與管理外生專班合開

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 本課程主要探討物業管理理論以及實際的操作手法。並結合現有的物業管理案例說明其實例運作方式在台灣的課題與機會。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the propertymanagement, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and  Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces.5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 本課程係將個別半導體製造程序視為獨立單元，運用化工單元操作的概念，併同現有半導體產業與未來發展趨勢的分析介紹，再輔以積體電路元件的設計原理，期使具化工背景人員能從製程、設備、元件原理等各方面取得一對半導體製程的整合性觀念。課程內容：(1)產業概覽(2)積體電路基本技術背景(3)積體電路設計(4)積體電路製造(5)內連線RC延遲電路與放大電路(6)金屬化製程技術(7)平坦化製程技術(8)物理氣相沉積與化學氣相沉積技術(9)線層/阻障層/種晶層(10)金屬填充/金屬互連(0.5~0.18um)(11)銅製程整合(0.13um含以上)(12)基極/位元線路/電容器(13)積體電路製程相關設備

description.zh: 選習本課程應具有普化及一般有機化學知識，此課程主要講授環境上（尤其是應用在工程上）有關的有機化學專業知識，其主要內容包括：１.有機物種與特性２.有機物之基本化學反應３.有毒（害）有機物之處理原理４.環境有機物之代謝與循環機制５.環境荷爾蒙之化性６.微量有機物之採樣分析原理
description.en: Based on general chemistry, the course provides professional knowledge on the organic chemistry in the environment. It includes the following major items：1.Characteristics and classification of organics.2.Fundamentals of chemical reaction for organics.3.Mechanics of cycling and metabolism of organics in the environment.4.Chemical properties of environmental Hollomans5.Theory of treatment for hazardous organics.6.Principle of sampling and analysis for micro-organics in the environment.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對薄膜處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。薄膜的種類介紹包括薄膜逆滲透、奈米薄膜、超過濾、微過濾、前驅滲透、電透析以及薄膜生物處理。基本理論包括薄膜前處理、質量傳輸、積垢、結構、薄膜阻塞及清理、後處理及實務應用。
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of membrane process for water treatment, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ultrafiltration, microfiltration, forward osmosis, electrodialysis and membrane bioreactor. The theories include pretreatment, mass transfer, fouling, scaling, membrane cleaning, post treatment and practical application.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

notes: 博班(綜科館第三演講廳)

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 本課程將包括中國專利法與其相關法規，尤其將著重於中國的專利申請的審查規範，故將以中國知識產權局所頒布的專利審查指南為藍本，內容將包括中國可授予的專利標的、專利的核准要件、專利請求項的撰寫與解讀、專利侵權與救濟，以及中國知識產權局或其法院相關專利案件。
description.en: The class survey Chinese patent laws, with an emphasis on the Patent Examination Guidelines promulgated by the State Intellectual Property Office (SIPO). The structure follows the basic contents of patent eligibility, patent validity, patent infringement, appeal, as well as some patent cases decided by the SIPO or Chinese courts.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。

name.en: The Development and Application of Embedded Multitasking Real-time Kernel

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded multitasking real-time kernel.  They will parse the structure of multitasking real-time kernel; learn the skill to design the embedded multitasking real-time kernel and the application technology.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded system introduction, (2)Multitasking real-time concept, (3)Kernel structure, (4)Task management, (5) Time management, (6)Memory management, (7) Event management, (8)Real-Time kernel porting.

description.zh: N
description.en: Piles of literature indicated that technology have been the main source of wealth creation of nations and that of competitive advantage of firms, with a special attention on semiconductor sector and system-on-chip technology. Moreover, technology has also become more complex, uncertain and expensive than ever before. Along with rapid technological change, it is imperative for firms to manage technology in an active and integrated way in order to survive and compete in the increasingly globalized markets. Drawn upon theoretical articles and empirical case study, the course aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of Management of Technology (MOT) with both micro (technology and firm) level and macro (secot and policy) level.

name.zh: 都市與建築的歷史性分析
name.en: Analysis on Historicity of Cities and Architecture

description.zh: 每個城市有其生長的脈絡與痕跡，即使歷史的命運與文化的特質使得某些城市有近似的發展面貌，但是就如同人類一般，沒有城市的面貌是相同的。本課程將從聚落或是城市發展的歷程，閱讀城市空間的特質。學習從城市的地理環境、街道與街廓的形態，以及從不同年代的建築類型、立面形式、甚至構造材料等等，亦即從都市紋理的演變，進行一座城市的歷史解讀。無論是經過計畫、呈現幾何性很強的城市，或是經由自然成長、具有有機發展痕跡的城市，均為本課程所探討的對象。而一座具有歷史的建築的生命歷程，亦會與城市一般，有其不同階段的生命歷程。這個建築的生命歷程，則反映在建築的各個元素與部位上。建築體的歷史，則更細膩地表現在建築的細部上，由空間形式、建築構成、結構、材料、構件組合方式、裝飾、裝飾匠師匠藝等等，藉由上述內容解讀建築的生命歷程，從而建立建築的生命年表，而可用於建築物歷史與價值的判定。上述的城市抑或是建築的共時性或歷時性的歷史性分析，均從類型學與形態學著手，建立一套歷史系譜。
description.en: Every city has its own historic context and traces, even though the historical fate and cultural characteristic shape some similar aspects of some cities. But, just like the look of human being, people look alike, but no one looks the same (except for twins). It doesn’t exist two identical cities. We would like to observe how a settlement or a city develops from its origin, and to read the characteristic of its space. We also try to learn to understand a city from its geographical environment, forms of streets and blocks, architectural types of diverse ages, styles of facades and even the constructive materials, etc., that is, from the development of its urban fabrics, to decode its spaces. No matter if those cities were planned with strong geometrical character, or expanded gradually with organic forms, we would study them in this seminar.Just as what we just describe on a city, one building or a group of buildings has their life history to be browsed. name.zh: 高等電力網路規劃及分析
name.en: Advanced Electric Power Network Planning and Analysis

description.zh: 配合高科技的應用，電力系統亦朝高科技發展，以便對用戶提供高品質、高可靠性、高效率及高安全性的電力，其中所面臨的問題很多必須加以解決，此有賴於良好的電力網路規劃，及對問題的分析探討。為此，本課程針對現今及未來電力系統的發展，探討其網路之規劃及分析，主要內容包括：1.先進電力網路之發展趨勢分析（包括發電、輸電、變電、配電等各級網路之發展趨勢分析）2.先進電力網路規劃之範圍及要項（包括系統架構、線路及設備之型式、數量、容量、位置及配置方式等）3.	負載特性之變化分析及負載成長預測（包括一般負載及科技產業負載）4.先進電力網路規劃所需考慮之因數及相關條件分析（包括負載需求、能源供應、環保要求、經濟因素、區域特性、社會因素、建設成本、運轉維護、未來成長、、、）5.先進電力網路之最佳規劃模式建立（包括目標（成本）函數及限制條件之探討及模式之建立）6.先進電力網路最佳規劃之解空間及求解方法探討（包括單目標最佳規劃及多目標最佳規劃）7.台灣電力網路規劃之特點8.實際案例之演練及解說
description.en: Electric power system is developing with high technology for supplying customers power with high quality, reliability, efficiency and security.  Many problems associated with this development should be solved, which are very relied on the well planning and analysis for the power network. For this, the course is aimed to the network planning and analysis for the today's and future's power system developments. The main contents of this course are:1.The development tendency of advanced electric power network,2.Scope and important items associated with electric power network planning,3.	Load characteristic variations analysis and load growth forecasting,4.Factors and related conditions to be considered for the advanced electric power network planning,5.Construction of the model of optimal advanced electric power network planning,6.The study of the solution space and searching methods for optimal advanced electric power network planning,7.The features of Taiwan electric

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

name.zh: 低碳經濟與低碳社會建構

description.zh: 21世紀國際為確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展，國際紛紛採取氣候變遷相關因應措施，低碳化已成為全球之共同趨勢。本課程將介紹節能減碳與低碳經濟及社會之國際趨勢、國際溫室氣體減量與能源安全相關法規、我國溫室氣體減量與節能相關法規等，並介紹碳足跡、碳中和等概念，由國際相關案例看我國邁向低碳經濟與社會挑戰與機會。
description.en: To ensure the sustainable development of environment, economy and society, effective measures are gradually adopted by internationals. Low-Carbonization obviously becomes a global common tendency. This course will be introduced the international tendencies of “energy saving & carbon reduction” and “low-carbon society”. It will also be introduced with related regulations of international greenhouse gases reduction, energy security, Taiwan GHG reduction, energy saving. The above concepts and latter concepts of carbon footprints and carbon neutral will be introduced with international practical cases to refer to challenges as well as chances toward a low-carbon Economy and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程介紹系統工程，系統工程專注於處理大型、複雜的專案發展時，所面臨的相關工程發展程序與問題，如何從計畫任務成型、系統設計、實體產出、整合測試、品質保證、系統操作、後勤支援、任務操作與結束等全程的一門跨多學科領域的管理與工程科學。本課程簡介系統工程重要議題，並以典型衛星系統研發作為本課程之應用範例。課程內容包括: 系統基本概念、系統工程基本概念、任務分析、系統需求、功能分析與配置、設計整合、產品獲取(或發展)與系統驗證、品質保證、系統管控、系統工程的實施、衛星系統工程實務。
description.en: The course will introduce systems engineering. Systems engineering normally emphasizes handling the engineering process and problems in the development of large and complicated projects/programs. It involves how the project/ program mission formed, system design, hardware/software components produced, integration and testing, quality assurance, system operations, logistics, mission operations until its decommission. It involves various interdisciplinary sciences and management skill for the engineering knowledge and skill to meet the needs for mission success.  This course will provide the introduction on the systems engineering and provide the typical satellites (mission) systems research and development as the examples for better understanding its wide applications. The courses may cover: fundamental concept of system and systems engineering, mission analysis, system requirements, functional analysis and allocations, design and integration, products procurement/ development and syste

notes: 電子所與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹字體設計與文字編排學的基本概念，理解文字編碼原理，熟悉資訊處理技術。課程內容包括：1. 電腦字體設計 2. 書法運筆 3. 襯線體 4. 無襯線字體 5. 文字編排學 6. 字間微調 7. 字形替換 8. 可縮放向量圖形技術 9. TrueType二次貝茲曲線 10. OpenType 三次貝茲曲線 11. 數字系統 12. 字集標準 13. 電腦字型格式 14. 編碼方法 15. 統一碼 16. 可變長度字元編碼 17. 中日韓統一表意文字。
description.en: This course introduces Computer Typography, Type Design, Character Encoding, and Information Processing Techniques. The course topics include: 1. Computer Type Design, 2. Calligraphy, 3. Serif, 4. Sans Serif, 5. Typography, 6. Kerning, 7. Glyph Substitution, 8. Scalable Vector Graphics, 9. TrueType Quadratic Bezier Curve, 10. OpenType Cubic Bezier Curves, 11. Number Systems, 12. Character Set Standards, 13. Font Formats, 14. Encoding Methods, 15. Unicode, 16. Unicode Transformation Format, 17. Chinese, Japanese and Korean (CJK) Unified Ideographs.

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、IDEO公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives.Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions.  Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysisDesign Feature Attribute Mapping(Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

notes: 四設四、創新設計碩士--日、職合開、最後一哩

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(四)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(IV)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(四)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(IV)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

notes: 創新設計碩士-日、職合開

name.zh: 體驗行銷與產品設計實務

description.zh: 介紹體驗行銷之理論基礎及技巧以作為產品設計開發的策略，結合策略體驗模組及體驗媒介於產品設計之應用，以達創造出對顧客有價值的產品體驗之目標。
description.en: The fundamental theory and application skills of experiential marketing are to be introduced in this course as a product development strategy. The strategic experiential modules and the experiential media are applied in product design to create a valuable product experience for customers.

description.zh: 公共生活環境中存在許多設計上的問題．本課程藉由觀察記錄等研究方法訓練，幫助同學釐清問題核心，並針對公共環境中的產品進行設計提案，滿足不特定多數人的需求．
description.en: There are many design problems in public environment. This course “Public Design” are implemented by teaching observation methods training, to help students clarify the core of the problem, and proposal Design for the public environment eventually. Making all public design meet the specific needs of the majority of users.

notes: 創新設計碩士-日、職合開

name.en: Special Project for Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程以實務案例介紹 (1)創新的本質，包括：技術創新、產品創新、策略創新、服務創新與管理創新，(2)創業的理念，包括創業家精神，創業的過程。學員將執行一項專題研究以演練創新創業實務。
description.en: This case-study-based course introduces (1) the nature of innovation, including technological innovation, product innovation, strategic innovation, service innovation and management innovation, and (2) the concept of entrepreneurship, including entrepreneurship and startup process. Students will conduct a special study to practice their basic skills on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 創新設計碩士-日、職合開

description.zh: 通用使用性在探討多元化使用族群的適用介面，以突破性的概念(concept)包容不同能力、經驗與背景的族群，讓設計的介面能在最大的程度上被每個人使用。本課程講授通用使用性的背景與發展， 闡述產品與介面使用性之理論與面對多元化使用族群的挑戰。探討通用使用性的門徑（approaches），包括：adaptive interface、multi-layer interface、multimodal interaction、flexibility of software technology 及 cognitive consistency。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認通用使用性之方法與實務。
description.en: Universal Usability is a design approach that will accommodate the diversity of user base, while supports a broad range of hardware, software, and network access.This course explores the theories of Universal Usability that works for everyone across the spectrum of ability, experience level and back ground.Issues on usability of interface and product will be discussed in order to generate initiatives in response to unmet needs, and then accommodate individual differences among users.Design principle that enhances human experience will be reviewed, in which cognitive consistency is the most promising approach to achieving universal usability.To develop a philosophical direction of Universal Usability, students are required to study selected literature and present in seminar discussion group.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

notes: 創新設計碩士--日職合開

description.zh: 1.橋樑結構分析2.RC橋設計3.規範闡釋
description.en: Advanced Bridge Engineering 1.Analysis of Structures of Bridge2.Design of RC-Bridges3.Explanation of Specifications

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.
