Construction contracting1、Construction contract types2、Efficiency、Performance and risk allocation of contract types3、Cost estimating and Bidding4、Subsuface Problems : predictable uncertainty differing site conditions

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個BIM相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM程式撰寫，BIM系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

description.zh: 從設計產業經營之立足點探討經典服務理論如：服務品質、服務設計與服務體驗工程（S.E.E.）之應用與實踐。授課內容側重於基礎服務理論與最新服務科學方法的介紹，並選擇特定服務產業進行實務研習對象。課程預計以主題講授、專家座談、分組研習方式進行，並分三期評量服務研習成果。
description.en: The course aims at the training of applying prominent service theories and methods such as Service Quality, Service Design, Service Experience Engineering (S.E.E.) to the management of design service. It proceeds in the forms of topics lecturing, professional speeches and groups study. The result of study is evaluated in three stages accordingly.

description.zh: 本課程係透過對文化之研究與解析，解構出具備設計發展之要素，並藉由設計專題之研討，實際應用文化意涵進行設計創作，發展出具創新之商品與服務，藉以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計應用之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the deconstruction of design element through the study and analysis of culture. This course also focuses on the training of students’ ability of multiple-culture analysis and design application through the design topic seminar and cultural-meaning-applied design practice that develop innovative products and service.

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、IDEO公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives.Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions.  Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysisDesign Feature Attribute Mapping(Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(四)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(IV)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

description.zh: 公共生活環境中存在許多設計上的問題．本課程藉由觀察記錄等研究方法訓練，幫助同學釐清問題核心，並針對公共環境中的產品進行設計提案，滿足不特定多數人的需求．
description.en: There are many design problems in public environment. This course “Public Design” are implemented by teaching observation methods training, to help students clarify the core of the problem, and proposal Design for the public environment eventually. Making all public design meet the specific needs of the majority of users.

description.zh: 通用使用性在探討多元化使用族群的適用介面，以突破性的概念(concept)包容不同能力、經驗與背景的族群，讓設計的介面能在最大的程度上被每個人使用。本課程講授通用使用性的背景與發展， 闡述產品與介面使用性之理論與面對多元化使用族群的挑戰。探討通用使用性的門徑（approaches），包括：adaptive interface、multi-layer interface、multimodal interaction、flexibility of software technology 及 cognitive consistency。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認通用使用性之方法與實務。
description.en: Universal Usability is a design approach that will accommodate the diversity of user base, while supports a broad range of hardware, software, and network access.This course explores the theories of Universal Usability that works for everyone across the spectrum of ability, experience level and back ground.Issues on usability of interface and product will be discussed in order to generate initiatives in response to unmet needs, and then accommodate individual differences among users.Design principle that enhances human experience will be reviewed, in which cognitive consistency is the most promising approach to achieving universal usability.To develop a philosophical direction of Universal Usability, students are required to study selected literature and present in seminar discussion group.

name.en: Special Project for Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程以實務案例介紹 (1)創新的本質，包括：技術創新、產品創新、策略創新、服務創新與管理創新，(2)創業的理念，包括創業家精神，創業的過程。學員將執行一項專題研究以演練創新創業實務。
description.en: This case-study-based course introduces (1) the nature of innovation, including technological innovation, product innovation, strategic innovation, service innovation and management innovation, and (2) the concept of entrepreneurship, including entrepreneurship and startup process. Students will conduct a special study to practice their basic skills on innovation and entrepreneurship.

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1.電源管理IC設計簡介 2.電壓參考電路設計 3.低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4.交換式電壓調整器 5.交換電容電源轉換器 6.電池充電技術與應用 7.設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

notes: 四子四甲乙與電子所合開  限25人

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

description.zh: 在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

notes: 四子三四甲乙與電子所合開，限35人

description.zh: 1. 固體結晶結構 2. 能隙與載子 3. 載子傳輸 4. 過量載子 5. P-N接面 6. 金半接面及半導體異質接面 7. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 8. 雙極電晶體
description.en: 1. Crystal Structure of Solids2. Energy Bands and Charge Carriers3. Carrier Transport4. Excess Carriers5. P-N Junctions6. Metal-Semiconductor and Semiconductor Heterojunstions7. Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Field Effect Transistor (MOSFET)8. Bipolar Transistor

description.zh: 1.傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2.離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3.Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

notes: 電子所與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹現有無線區域網路規格的多工存取層及實體層，並深入解說規格中所使用通訊技術的原理，如載波偵測多工－避免碰撞通訊協定，正交分頻多工調變技術。
description.en: This course contains the medium access control layer(MAC) and physical layer(PHY) of the mose recent IEEE 802.11 standards for wireless local area networks. Thechniques employed by the standards, e.g.,craier sense multiple access/collision avoidance (CSMA/CA),orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDA), will be discussed in details.

notes: 電子所與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing.  In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

notes: 經管所與職經管所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

notes: 經管所與職經管所合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究快速原型之原理與方法，並藉設計實例演練，以達熟悉研究快速原型之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the principle and method of rapid prototype.  By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of rapid prototype.

notes: 創新設計碩士-日、職合開

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的是介紹計算流體力學方法在工程上的應用，使學生能利用計算流力方法配合電腦的快速運算能力以解決工程上與能源、冷凍空調及熱流相關的問題。課程內容主要包括：計算流力簡介、基礎熱流方程式、紊流模式、有限差分法簡介、有限體積法簡介、套裝軟體應用以及案例分析。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the engineering application of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). Based upon the method of CFD and fast calculation ability of computers, students can solve related problems in the fields of energy, refrigeration and air-conditioning, and thermofluid sciences. The main content of this course includes "Introduction to CFD", "Foundation of thermofluid governing equations", "Turbulent models", "Introduction to finite difference method", "Introduction to finite volume method", "Application of package software", and "Case study".

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

notes: 碩士與碩專班合併開課

description.zh: 木構造建築因為低耗能、低碳排放，生長過程中又能固定碳，故可視為最佳之綠建築之建造型式。發展高層或大規模木造建築為世界趨勢及潮流，有鑑於建築系學生對於現代木造建築的結構行為及設計理論等專業知識付之闕如，為使其能更瞭解木構造建築，特以此講義及設計演習課程，介紹現代木構造的基本及應用知識及設計練習。
description.en: Wood as a renewable resource provides a non-negligible contribution to the protection of the environment. The fabrication of most wooden products requires less energy and natural resources than other building materials commonly used in the world. This lecture illustrates not only realized modern wooden constructions and applications; it also promotes future ideas for middle- and high-rise wooden buildings. Students will learn comprehensive knowledge and design application of modern wooden structure.

description.zh: 此課程為研究所初級課程，主要以三個方面介紹線性規劃：數學模型建立、演算法與原理、對偶理論及敏感度分析。
description.en: This is an introductory level course for graduate students. This course will cover linear programming including the mathematical models, the simplex methods, duality and sensitivity analysis.

notes: 四工四甲乙與工管所合開【停開】

name.zh: 建築資訊規劃、管理與分析模型
name.en: Architectural Planning, Management, and Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討建築專案施工的過程：規劃施工階段、管理進度排程、控制施工順序與建置各階段結構分析模型。
description.en: From the exposition to the concepts of construction processes, modeling of construction operations, the use of queuing, line of balance, and simulation of construction processes, the objective of this course is to enable students to orient the modeling of construction processes.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何設計與應用微控制器，啟發學生對於微控制器的創意設計。包含：1.相關程式撰寫、2.跑馬燈程式撰寫與實作驗證、3.序列埠控制 (監控視窗、LED控制)、4.七段顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、5.LED矩陣程式撰寫與實作驗證、6.LCD顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、7. PWM馬達控制程式撰寫與實作驗證、8. I2C介面程式撰寫與實作驗證、9.電子琴程式撰寫與實作驗證。10.超音波感測程式撰寫與實作驗證。
description.en: This course is to train students for microcontrollers design and applications.  Inspire students to creative microcontroller design. Comprising: 1. Related programs written. 2. Marquee program written and implement verification. 3. Serial port control (monitoring windows, LED control). 4. Seven segment display program written and implement verification. 5. LED matrix program written and implement verification. 6. LCD display program written and implement verification. 7. PWM motor control program written and implement verification. 8. I2C interface program written and implement verification. 9. Keyboard program written and implement verification. 10. Ultrasonic sensing program written and implement verification.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討下列議題:文學與藝術的創作和女性自覺有什麼樣的關係?在現代社會,文學與藝術作品的創作與欣賞對女性又具有何種特別的意義?為追索答案,本課程引領學生探訪自十九世紀末期到今日在文藝界的女性翹楚,賞析她們在各自領域的獨特成就,並探究她?的天賦秉性與所置身之社會文化之互動關係.涵蓋的領域包括:詩,(短篇)小說,戲劇(舞台與電影劇本),散文,攝影,電影,繪畫,建築設計等當今文化重要面向.
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students toward a panoramic view and in-depth understanding of women's creativity at its highest level of achievement in the realms of British/American literature and the modern arts since the late nineteenth century.  We will study the most representative works by women writers in each of the following literary genres: poetry, short stories, novels, drama (and screenplays), and essays. We will also explore masterpieces of artworks by female artists in the following fields: film, photography, paintings and architectural designs. Students will be asked to explore the correlation among the significance of the writer/artist's works, the cultural background she is/was situated, and the individual talents and temperament of the writer/artist herself. The purpose of these investigations is to answer the following questions:  What do literature and art have to do with femininity in the modern world? What do literature and art mean to women?

name.zh: 語料庫語言學與英語教學

description.zh: 本課程提供關於語料庫語言學的介紹，包含語料庫分析工具、分析方法、語料庫設計與建構，及語料庫為本的研究方法等；同時，本課程亦探討其在英語教學上的應用。主要的主題涵蓋字彙教學與學習、詞組分析、中介語分析、教材分析、言談分析，及電腦輔助語言學習等。修課學生將學習如何針對不同研究主題，收集語料、構建小型語料庫，並運用所學之語料庫軟體進行語料分析等。
description.en: This course offers an introduction to corpus linguistics, including the corpus analytical tools, techniques, corpus design and construction, and methodologies for doing corpus-based studies. We will also discuss its applications in English language teaching and learning. Major topics include vocabulary teaching and learning, analysis of chunks, teaching materials analysis, interlanguage analysis, discourse analysis, and computer-assisted language learning. Students are expected to learn to collect corpora data, create a small corpus, run and analyze corpora data according to different research topics.

description.zh: 具備領導力和溝通技巧的知識，是經營管理學程中不可或缺的訓練。我們將由商業實務案例中，共同分析和探討，以培育學生為全球商業開發和經營的技能而準備。
description.en: This course, Leadership and Communication, is offered from a practitioner’s viewpoints on how to deploy the concepts, knowledge, and experiences for the development of leadership and communication practice in order to achieve the long-term business goals. The leadership role in the 21st century is not only for the internal management concerning but also for a broad range of issues, such as cross-cultural knowledge on business development, communications, negotiations, strategic thinking; and creative and innovative ideas. In other words, appropriate leadership and communication skills, in particular, are the killer-tactics to manage the current market-lead and ubiquitous technology driven world. We will review articles and discuss real business cases.

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡: 包括物質本性, 化學熱力學, 化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化: 包括化學反應速率與動力學, 分子反應動力學, 表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

name.en: Design of switching mode power supply

description.zh: 1.簡介2.功率級電路3.轉換器架構與分析4.控制電路5.回授電路6.保護電路7.電路佈局與機構8.應用電路分析
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Power Stage Circuit3.Converter Topology4.Control Circuit5.Feedback Circuit6.Circuit Protection7.Circuit Layout and Machanism8.Application Circuit

description.zh: 科學與技術是了解這個世界和我們自己一項強而有力的工具，而許多作家們對於這樣的情況也在他們的作品中給予各式各樣的回應。在這個課程中我們將學習到作家們如何在他們的作品中使用文學藝術技巧來詮釋與解讀科技與現代文學的相互作用；人類與大自然的關係；以及人類當前的處境。修習這門課程的學生並不需要具備對科學有嚴格的基礎訓練與知識，只要具備強烈的好奇心和求知慾。在課程的一開始我們將藉由閱讀相關作品讓大家熟悉一些重要的議題。課程的中心主題除了針對科學技術與文學的相互關係外，我們也將焦點放在分析文學作品上。我們將繼續探索文學形式與內容的關聯。同時，我們也將利用現代科技在課堂上練習文學作品的即興創作。學生們一開始分析一段正文的內容。然後他們利用這些片段重新組合成一篇新的文本。接著，在這些文本內建立新的超連結︰每當文本被閱讀時，讀者能有多種選擇來閱讀並且使正文成為一個完全新的實體。
description.en: Science and technology are powerful modes of knowing about the world and ourselves, and the rich and varied responses of writers to these ways of knowing. The writers whose works we'll be looking at use art to question the ways that science and technology interact with and alter our understanding of the world, human nature and the human condition. People do not need a formal background in science to enjoy and excel in this course, just a lively intellectual curiosity. A few background essays will help you understand many of the scientific concepts and attitudes we will encounter in the literature we read. While the course does have a central thematic interest in science and technology, our main focus will always be on analyzing literature and its interaction with science and technology. We will continually ask how form, or the construction of a literary work, relates to content, or the meaning of a literary work. This means our main focus will be to analyze the techniques that writers

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉質與量研究方法的設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、行動研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with qualitative and quantitative research procedures and the statistical design involved in education and applied linguistics research. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.zh: 半導體廠營運管理及先進製造技術
name.en: Fab Operation Management and Advanced Manufacturing Technology

description.zh: 半導體廠營運管理及先進製造技術這門課分為兩個部分；營運管理部分的課程內容主要是以IE的角度，探討IE在半導體廠中可以參與什麼樣的營運活動，其內容包含的課題如供應鏈管理、產能規劃、成本分析、預算管理、建廠及設施規劃、專案管理、策略規劃、技術移轉及開發管理以及合約及商業談判等。講師以其自身的經歷，提供給同學不同於教科書上的實務經驗。第二部分將以先進製造技術專題的方式講授，包含批次控制、虛擬量測、錯誤偵測、高混線生產等議題。
description.en: This lecture includes two segments. For “Operation Management”, a few popular topics will be addressed from I.E. point of view in a semiconductor company such as “Supply Chain Management”, “Capacity Planning”, “Cost Analysis”, “Budget Management”, “Construction and Facility Planning”, “Strategic Planning”, “Management in Technology Transfer and Development” and “Agreement and Business Negotiation”, etc. Instructor will share his personal experiences in practice which are quite different from the textbooks. For “Advanced Manufacturing Technology”, some state-of-the-art APC topics will be addressed. Included are “R2R Control”, “Virtual Metrology”, “Fault Detection”, “High-Mix Product Control”, among others.

description.zh: 本課程介紹公司管理者在作財務決策時，會產生心理偏誤，進而做出不適當的財務決策。另外，本課程也提供管理者如何避免心理偏誤，並改善其財務決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討公司理財的決策。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect managers' financial decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹並討論衡量系統可靠度常用的機率模式、串連系統、並連系統及混合式系統的可靠度特性及其評估方式。此外也介紹評估實際系統時常用的統計方法及資料蒐集和推論的技巧，最後討論可修護系統的可靠度衡量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss how to construct the structure fuhction of a system and to culculate its reliability.some probability models and probability distributions that are commonly used for lifetime representations will be introduced.series system,parallel system,and the conlination of both will be thorouqhly diseerssed in respect of their reliability characteristics. The statistical mefthods related to data colleetion and inference that are useful when evaluating the reliability of real-life systems will also be mentioned. Finally,we will introduce the concept of repairabie systems and related probability models.

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
description.en: This course focuses on the design and evaluation of interactive systems from a human centric perspective. Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料(包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等)基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1)課程簡介, (2)電化學基本原理與應用, (3)水溶液系統電池分類與應用,(4)非水溶液系統電池分類與應用, (5)鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程, (6)鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (7)鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (8)電解液材料與高分子電池特性, (9)隔離膜材料功能與製作, (10)薄膜電池, (11)超高電容器材料原理與應用, (12)儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

notes: 材料所與材料所在職專班合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 高速數位訊號完整設計

description.zh: 1.基礎傳輸線理論2.耦合3.非理想的傳輸線效應4.構裝、連接器與穿接腳5.電源供應系統6.電子電路的模擬
description.en: 1.Ideal Transmission line Fundamentals2.Crosstalk3.Nonideal Interconnect Issues4.Connectors, Packages, and Vias5.Nonideal Return Paths, Simultaneous Switching Noise and Power Delivery6.Electronic Circuits Simulations

description.zh: 1.無線傳輸技術之效能評估2.GSM系統之分析與模擬3.IS-95 CDMA系統之分析與模擬4.第三代行動通訊系統之分析與模擬5.定位機制之探討6.統計通道模擬7.定點通道模擬
description.en: 1.Performance Evaluation of Wireless Transmission Techniques2.Analysis and Simulation of GSM System3.Analysis and Simulation of IS-95 CDMA System4.Analysis and Simulation of 3G Systems5.Positioning6.Statistic Channel Modeling 7.Sight Specific Channel modeling

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。

Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 社會設計，目前在國內雖較少被提出討論，但卻是近年來國外在探討企業創新時的關鍵趨勢。因此本課程將邀請各界專家分享他們是什麼契機下開始關注社會設計，也分別舉出幾個國內、外的實例來說明，並將結合互動媒體的科技優勢來進行創作。因為社會設計不應只被視為政府單位或非營利組織的推動事務，其實每一個人或民間企業，都極有可能運用設計來創造出很不一樣的社會價值。
description.en: Social design have been much discussed widespread in business innovation but rarely in Taiwan. In this course, we invite experts to share at what moment they begin to focus on social design, giving examples worldwide, and creating works that combine interactive media. Social design is not just a policy that run by government or non-governmental organization, you and I can use design to create unique social value.

description.zh: 擴增實境 (Augmented Reality, AR) 著重在與真實世界的結合，增強真實世界裡的資訊顯示與互動經驗，透過該產品，能夠輕而易舉地得到真實景物的資訊。本課程內容先介紹AR原理、技術發展與限制、可應用的展示平台、與其他技術搭配應用、各領域應用案例，如數位學習、醫療、即時翻譯、展示、遊戲與娛樂。
description.en: Augmented Reality (AR) concerns about the combination between real and virtual world. AR technology is to display information inside any objects or devices. The course will introduce AR principles, technology development and constraints, applicable display platform, combination with other technology, implication cases in any fields such as digital learning, medical care, instant translation, display, game and amusement.

notes: 使用進修部(三教505)教室(20人)

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

notes: 四分四和高分所碩士班合開【停開】

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．
description.en: Basic Conservation Laws , Flow Kinematics , Special Forms of Governing Equations, Ideal-Fluid Flow ( Two-dimensional , Three-dimensional Potential Flows )Surface Waves , Low-Reynolds-Number Solutions , Boundary Layers , Shock Waves

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: 限博士班 綜科館708室

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

name.en: Intelligent Applications of Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生機器學習、大數據等人工智慧技術，並使用在物聯網的創新與應用上。課程內容包括：人工智慧概論、大數據方法、機器學習方法、資料探勘方法、最佳化方法、物聯網概論、影音處理、雲端技術、物聯網系統實作等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of artificial intelligent methods and apply these methods to innovative applications of Internet of Things. The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

notes: 資財,電子,電機,資工系所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 資訊管理技能及創意個案實務研討
name.en: Information Management Techniques and Case studies on Creativity

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生資訊管理的基本技術，並透過一些創意的個案，讓同學了解如何應用這些基本技術。課程內容包括：資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、大數據方法、網路管理、軟體工程、創意個案介紹與研討、資訊管理與創意激發等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic information management techniques and creativity case studies.  The goal is to let the students realize how to apply information management techniques. The contents include information strategies management, database management, big data, network management, software engineering, discussions and case studies on creativity, information management and creativity inspiration, and so forth.

name.en: Entrepreneurship Practices: The Apprentice in NTUT

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

notes: 四資財三與碩士班、最後一哩合開(創新創業種子教師)

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料(包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等)基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1)課程簡介, (2)電化學基本原理與應用, (3)水溶液系統電池分類與應用,(4)非水溶液系統電池分類與應用, (5)鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程, (6)鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (7)鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (8)電解液材料與高分子電池特性, (9)隔離膜材料功能與製作, (10)薄膜電池, (11)超高電容器材料原理與應用, (12)儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

notes: 材料所與材料所在職專班合開

name.zh: 繞射光學原理與應用含實習
name.en: Theory and Application of Diffractive Optics with Lab practice

description.zh: 繞射光學是基於光波繞射的原理，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、此類的微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：1.光學繞射原理2.傅式光學3.繞射光學元件之設計方法4.繞射光學元件之應用5.繞射光學元件之實現與製作
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the principle of diffraction of optical wave and study the means of using the diffraction to perform optical setups in modern optical systems. Diffractive optical element (DOE) can be applied to correct aberrations, light focusing, light splitting, and other novel functions that traditional optical components difficultly or impossibly perform. DOE plays an important role in modern optical technology. The content of this course includes: 1. Principle of optical diffraction, 2. Fourier optics, 3. Design methods of DOE, 4. Applications of DOEs, and 5. Implementation of DOEs.

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     創新設計之意涵，創新設計之方法，創新設計之個案研究，智慧財產權之維護。
description.en: Meaning of Creative Design, Methods of Creative Design, Case study of Creative Design,      Protection of Intellectual Properties.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. Bayesian， Minimax 原裡分析和測試 3. 古典的假說測試和混合式假說測試 4. 離散時間信號的偵測 5. 連續時間信號的偵測 6. 循序性的假說測試 7. 參數估測
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Bayesian, Minimax analysis and testing 3. Classical hypothesis testing and composite hypothesis testing 4. Signal detection in discrete time 5. Signal detection in continuous time 6. Sequential hypothesis testing 7. Parameter estimation

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

name.zh: 心理物理學與信號偵測理論

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何以科學方法研究物理刺激與認知感官之間的關係，並採用信號偵測理論，進而考量人因工程於產品、系統設計之應用。
description.en: The goal of the course is to empower students in learning the scientific approach of psychophysics, the relation between physical stimuli and human sensations and perceptions, applying the method of signal detection theory. Further applications applying human factors and ergonomics in product development and system design are considered.

name.zh: 資訊創新達人國際證照講座
name.en: Seminar of International Certification on Informational Creativity Experts

description.zh: 為提升學生資訊媒體創新應用能力，培養敬業樂業精神與優良就業態度，增加職場就業競爭力。因此，透過本實務講座，針對資訊軟體ADOBE PHOTOSHOP應用、平面設計人員、影像處理等國際專業證照開設輔導課程。本課程將介紹資訊媒體基本知識與從業人員應具備的專業職能，並輔導同學取得國際專業證照，適合於有志從事資訊媒體與設計相關工作及大學校院相關系所學生。俾培育學生參加並通過專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長，並提升畢業後之職場競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to introduce practices of international certification in information and multimedia. This course is designed for students who want to participate in professional certification, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to assist students information basics and media design professional capability, and to develop their employability and competitiveness.

notes: 四資財三與碩士班、最後一哩合開

name.zh: 企業永續與生命週期管理特論
name.en: Special Topics on Corporate Sustainability and Life Cycle Management

description.zh: 這主要是給開給博士生及二年級以上碩士生的課程，將主要以課題式(Topics)的討論為主, 討論將會以最新之期刊論文為主, 內容探討的議題將包括(不限):1.企業永續治理(Corporate Sustainable Governance)2.企業永續揭露及報告(Sustainability Disclosure and Reporting)3.綠色與永續創新(Green and Sustainable Competitiveness)4.繁茂昌盛(Flourishing vs. Sustainability)5.地球限度(Planetary Boundaries)如何整合至企業經營之中6.B團隊及B計畫(B Team and Plan B)7.LCA-based的ISO標準及其發展8.社會面相之生命週期評估(SLCA)9.生命週期永續性評估(LCSA)10.金字塔底層(Base of the Pyramid)11.其他
description.en: This course is mainly for doctorial students and senior master students. Advanced and newly developed topics on Corporate Sustainability and Life Cycle Assessment and Management will be studied and students will be asked to find and read research papers for discussion. Related topics are included as follows(not limited):1.Corporate Sustainable Governance2.Sustainability Disclosure and Reporting3.Green and Sustainable Competitiveness4.Flourishing vs. Sustainability5.Planetary Boundaries6.B Team and Plan B7.LCA-based ISO international Standards8.Social Life Cycle Assessment(SLCA)9.Life Cycle Sustainability Assessment (LCSA)10.Base of the Pyramid11.Others

name.zh: CMOS元件量測與可靠度工程
name.en: CMOS Device Measurement and Reliability Engineering

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。課程簡介，材料簡介，量子效應，被動元件，被動元件特性，主動元件，主動元件特性，主動元件參數，元件設計，參數粹取，氧化層可靠性分析，熱載子效應，金屬漂移分析，產品可靠性分析(包括靜電防護)。
description.en: Introduction, semiconductor materials, quantum effect, passive devices, characteristics of passive devices, active devices, characteristics of active devices, parameters of active devices, pattern designs., parameter extraction, oxide reliability analysis, hot carrier effect, metal migration analysis, product reliability analysis (including ESD protection).

name.en: Special topics of modern manufacturing technology

description.zh: 介紹最新製造技術中的特殊項目，包括：1、製造實驗及統計分析2、製造設備，強調電腦化的運動控制及製程控制3、電腦化的製造系統，如CAD、CAM、CIM、LAN及因電腦化產生的系統進化。
description.en: Introducing special topics of newest manufacturing technology. Including:1.Manufacturing experiments and statistical evaluation.2.Manufacturing equipment, emphasizing on computerized motion control and process control.3.Computerized manufacturing system, like CAD, CAM, CIM, LAN, and manufacturing system 's evolution due to computerization.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以Excel進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以實務產業個案做探討。教學方式採哈佛大學個案教學方式進行。藉由分析研讀個案的學習機會，以激發出更豐富的管理創意，經由學習者的熱情投入和教師們的互動，使EMBA 學程的參與者將逐漸培養出分析和解決複雜問題的能力。除外，透過個案討論過程，使學生能於個案情境中學習相關產業及管理知識。
description.en: This course aims to explore the practical industrial cases do. Case teaching will follow Harvard University teaching manner. By analyzing the case study learning opportunities, the students will be stimulated in order to learn a more extensive management ideas. Through the enthusiasm of learners’ put in and the interaction with teacher, so that the participants EMBA learning process will gradually develop the capability to analyze and solve complex problems. Except through case discussions, so that students can learn in the context of cases related industries and management expertise.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與EMBA學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發EMBA學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange the ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

name.en: Electrical and Mechanical Systems of Railway Transit Systems

description.zh: 1.供電系統、2.電力系統之控制機制、3.牽引系統之主要回路、4.車速控制系統、5.煞車控制系統、6.運行理論、7.列車行控技術、8.其他機電工程
description.en: This course helps students to learn about the operating strategies and energy converting technologies in railway transit systems. Here, the following topics are contented in this course.1.Power Supply System.  2.Control Mechanism of Power System.  3.Main Circuits of Traction System.  4.Speed Control System.  5.Braking Control and Energy Conversion.  6.Train Operation Theorem.  7.Vehicle Driving Control/Technology  8.Other concerning topics as energy conversion strategies etc. will also be introduced in this courses.

description.zh: 資源工程導論為資源工程的入門學科，其範圍包括天然的金屬、非金屬、礦物與石油、天然氣、建築用砂石、石材與水等原生資源，以及工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的可再生資源。期對初學者有一整體的基本概念。
description.en: This is a general introduction class to provide student basic knowledge about resources engineering which include metal, nonmetal, minerals, petroleum, natural gas, aggregates, dimension stone and water resources.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電磁波散射與微波電路組件為主，深入介紹下列議題並討論如何分析、設計、製作與量測：1.雷達系統之簡介。2.智慧型車用雷達。3.表面散射與體積散射。4.微波遙測。5.各種高頻轉接電路的設計。 6.各種高頻平面電路的設計。7.多端埠平面電路的量測校正技術。
description.en: 1. Introduction to radar systems.2. Intelligent vehicular radar systems.3. Surface scattering and volume scattering.4. Microwave remote sensing.5. Designs for various high-frequency transitions. 6. Designs for various high-frequency planar circuits.7. Measurement and calibration techniques for multi-port planar circuits.

description.zh: 深入探討最新的IC製程技術，包含前段的加熱、離子植入、物理沈積、化學沈積、微影、蝕刻等製程，及後段的各種封裝技術及測試方法，並介紹其研究方向、製程與元件物理的關係及製程整合的技術。
description.en: Study the state of the art of the IC fabrication processes, including heating, ion implant, PVD, CVD, lithograph, etching of the front-end processes and packaging and testing of back-end processes. The trends of the processes, the relationship of the processes with the physics of the devices and the process integrating technology will also be taught in this course.

description.zh: 設計領導係指領導設計與透過設計領導事業，環視益形挑戰與機會的設計創新環境，深具前瞻洞察力的願景與策略是贏得設計領導地位之關鍵因素。本課程含蓋相關文獻理論與實務案例，透過個案研討深入探究如何贏得企業設計領導競爭優勢與永續繁榮成功之道。
description.en: Design leadership means to design and to lead-to lead design and to lead business by design. Today, those responsible for design creation face leadership challenges and opportunities greater than ever before. Who should lead design? Who leads by design? How and why does a company "lead with design?" Design leadership has many interpretations, ranging from inspiration to collaboration and from culture to globalization. Design leadership is a commercial imperative. It creates differentiation, sustains competitive advantage, and enables world-class performance that is sustainable into the future.This course will provide the insight and interaction essential to utilizing design leadership for business success. Vision and strategy are the critical elements of leadership. It covers the strategy and the effects of inspiring design leadership and the personal characteristics and attributes of great design leaders.

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course includes international economic environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.

description.zh: 設計領導係指領導設計與透過設計領導事業，環視益形挑戰與機會的設計創新環境，深具前瞻洞察力的願景與策略是贏得設計領導地位之關鍵因素。本課程含蓋相關文獻理論與實務案例，透過個案研討深入探究如何贏得企業設計領導競爭優勢與永續繁榮成功之道。

notes: 設計博與創新碩士班合開

description.zh: 跨文化溝通, 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved intercultural communication and design project with research and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive research. The study of related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing.  In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 透過講解設計力創新理論/知識、實務案例研討、相關影音觀賞，研習設計力創新策略/流程/能力，整合商學管理與設計創意/創新/創業之共創思維與實戰能力。
description.en: Design driven innovation has emerged to be an alternative way to generate sustainable competitive products or services. To produce products which are design-driven innovation, companies need designers who “envision and investigate new product meanings through a broader, in-depth exploration of the evolution of society, culture, and technology acting as interpreters who are able to envision how people could give meaning to things through intense involvement in the design discourse” (Verganti, 2008). Verganti (2009) proposes three distinct process stages of design-driven innovation, in terms of listening, interpreting, and addressing.

description.zh: 面對國際多元化人文地理與異質性的市場需求，如何研究與發展有效地國際市場行銷策略與管理為本課程的主要目標。學生將學習國際企業面對經營環境變化，如何成功地進入國際市場，進而展開國際市場行銷策略與活動，建構企業競爭優勢，創造卓越經營績效。本課程透過有系統地介紹國際企業、國際環境、國際市場進入策略、國際市場行銷策略與行銷組合決策等，並利用案例分析將學術理論與管理實務作連結，訓練學生發展從事國際市場行銷的知識與方法，期望使學生深入瞭解國際市場情形，並具備規劃與執行國際市場行銷策略的能力。
description.en: Facing international diversified geography and heterogeneity demand，the main goal of this course is how to study and develop effective international marketing strategy and management. Students will learn that how international companies, in the changing business environment, successfully enter the international market, and then expand the international marketing strategy and activities, construct competitive advantage, and create excellence business performance. The course through the systematic introduction of international business, international environment, international market entry strategies, international marketing strategy and marketing mix decisions, etc., and the use of case studies to academic theory and management practices for the link, trains students to develop knowledge in the international marketing of and methods, This course is expected to enable students to understand the international market situation, and allows students to have the ability to plan and implement

name.en: The Leadership Philosophy of Senior Manager

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階主管的領導理論與實務。課程目的有三個：(1)了解高階主管的領導與管理；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界高階主管提供具體建議。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of senior manager’s leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is (especially for the senior managers); (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for senior managers’ leadership.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解金融體系的運作，其中包括了金融中介機構、金融市場、金融工具，以及政府對金融產業的法令規範。此外，本課程亦從金融理論面的角度探討金融市場機制與金融機構運作，其之所以存在以的理由以及其所扮演之角色。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the financial system, including the financial intermediaries, financial markets, financial instruments, and government regulations. In addition, this course is going to provide a conceptual framework to help students understand why markets exist and what their roles are in the financial environment.

notes: 經管所與管理外生專班合開

description.zh: 解析國內國家考試「會計學」之命題趨勢。並以實際國家考試考古題為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Resolve domestic national examination "Accounting" Trend proposition. And the actual state exam archaeological entitled case in the problem solving process to guide students to build a complete system of accounting theory, enhance students' understanding of accounting theory and application capabilities, develop logical thinking of students, and enhance problem-solving skills, passed the national exam.

notes: 四管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本堂課邀請元大寶來期貨、證券及財富管理各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財報分析選股、期權商品策略介紹及交易實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en: This class is going to invite investment experts from Yuanta Futures and Yuanta Securities to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

notes: 四管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創業講座-創業楷模來抬槓
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures-  Chat with Successful Entrepreneurs

description.zh: 本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: ABC節，6週；四管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(二)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

notes: ABC節，6週；四設四、創新設計碩士與最後一哩合開

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 資訊蒐集技術是研究生在從事研究工作與論文寫作時必須具備的工具。本課程主要目的在協助研究生在眾多的資訊來源中，如何搜尋正確及高品質的資訊。課程內容涵蓋資訊蒐集技術的原則及應用，並探討多種的實用工具及電子資訊來源，以滿足研究生在作研究及論文寫作上對資訊的需求。
description.en: Information gathering skills are essential to the studying of graduate students and the development of their subject knowledge on dissertation/thesis writing. The course is designed to help graduate students to find the right kind and the right quality of information from the vast amount available.  The content of the course will deal with the broad principles and practices underlying information gathering techniques which explore the many practical tools and electronics sources of information that will help graduate students find the information they need when doing research or writing the dissertation/thesis.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程係透過對文化之研究與解析，解構出具備設計發展之要素，並藉由設計專題之研討，實際應用文化意涵進行設計創作，發展出具創新之商品與服務，藉以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計應用之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the deconstruction of design element through the study and analysis of culture. This course also focuses on the training of students’ ability of multiple-culture analysis and design application through the design topic seminar and cultural-meaning-applied design practice that develop innovative products and service.

notes: 創新設計碩士--日、職合開

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋能源開發及儲存過程中之有機、無機及觸媒材料之介紹以及材料檢測光譜技術。授課重點介紹各項材料檢測技術包含BET，紅外線光譜，拉曼光譜和阻抗。從分子觀點至巨觀角度探討天然氣轉化液體燃料，燃料電池，太陽能電池，發光二極管，能源儲存及CO2捕獲程序。
description.en: This course covers organic, inorganic and catalytic materials for energy generation and storage processes as well as spectroscopic techniques for material characterization.   Topics for characterization includes BET, infrared, Raman, and Impedance.  Gas to liquid fuel, fuel cell, solar cell, light-emitting diodes, energy storage, and CO2 capture processes will be discussed from molecular mechanistic level to the macroscopic device level.

notes: 欲加選本課程，請洽化工系辦

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

notes: 電機所、電子系所與最後一哩合開,實驗課,限20人

name.zh: 國際青年創業領袖計畫
name.en: Young Entrepreneurs of the Future - YEF

description.zh: YEF計畫希望培育年輕人敢開創、勇於接受挑戰、善於解決問題的創業精神，為社 會注入永續發展的人才活水。本計畫是一個跨領域、跨國際、跨自我的學習計畫，鼓 勵學子跨校、跨院聯結，經由長達 6~10 個月的模擬實務學習，試鍊團隊合作、創新創 業精神、執行力及國際網絡能力，在國內是備受推崇的『第二軌』教育計畫。
description.en: The YEF program aims to plant the seeds of enterpreneurship among our younger generation.  We hope that, with this entrepreneurship, the young people can be more proactive to innovate, to take on any challenges, and even to overcome the difficulties along the way. Thus we hope this will eventually inject new vigor and vitality into our society.

notes: 系所,最後一哩合開,報名YEF計畫再加選,參加2/22說明會

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；課程重點包括認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派之分析、學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢等。
description.en: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.

description.zh: 觀摩學習長春集團以研發、創新、工安、環保為企業文化之核心元素，為台灣率先引領石化業邁向高值化的典範企業集團。以真實具體的化工裝置設計、研發、創新、工安、環保經驗為教材，進而激發學生追求化工科技創新的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: The course will invite the domestic business of Chang Chun Group to share their success experiences and new technologies. By offering the real design of chemical process equipments, research and innovation in development, industrial safety and hygiene, environmental protection and specific examples. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement of chemical engineering to strengthen their innovation wills to plan the future.

description.zh: 本課程介紹公司管理者在作財務(或其他)決策時，會產生的心理偏誤。另外，本課程也提供管理者如何避免心理偏誤，並改善其決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討公司管理者的決策。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect managers' financial (and other) decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc. In addition, this course is also to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets.

name.en: Intelligent Applications of Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生機器學習、大數據等人工智慧技術，並使用在物聯網的創新與應用上。課程內容包括：人工智慧概論、大數據方法、機器學習方法、資料探勘方法、最佳化方法、物聯網概論、影音處理、雲端技術、物聯網系統實作等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of artificial intelligent methods and apply these methods to innovative applications of Internet of Things. The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

description.zh: 從設計產業經營之立足點探討經典服務理論如：服務品質、服務設計與服務體驗工程（S.E.E.）之應用與實踐。授課內容側重於基礎服務理論與最新服務科學方法的介紹，並選擇特定服務產業進行實務研習對象。課程預計以主題講授、專家座談、分組研習方式進行，並分三期評量服務研習成果。
description.en: The course aims at the training of applying prominent service theories and methods such as Service Quality, Service Design, Service Experience Engineering (S.E.E.) to the management of design service. It proceeds in the forms of topics lecturing, professional speeches and groups study. The result of study is evaluated in three stages accordingly.

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.
